nodes.name: DetherAccessControl

nodes.documentation: @dev Emited when contract is upgraded
nodes.name: ContractUpgrade

nodes.documentation: @dev Access modifier for CEO-only functionality
nodes.name: onlyCEO

nodes.documentation: @dev Access modifier for CMO-only functionality
nodes.name: onlyCMO

nodes.documentation:
@dev Assigns a new address to act as the CEO. Only available to the current CEO.
 @param _newCEO The address of the new CEO
nodes.name: setCEO

nodes.documentation:
@dev Assigns a new address to act as the CMO. Only available to the current CEO.
 @param _newCMO The address of the new CMO
nodes.name: setCMO

nodes.documentation: @dev Modifier to allow actions only when the contract IS NOT paused
nodes.name: whenNotPaused

nodes.documentation: @dev Modifier to allow actions only when the contract IS paused
nodes.name: whenPaused

nodes.documentation:
@dev Called by any "C-level" role to pause the contract. Used only when
  a bug or exploit is detected and we need to limit damage.
nodes.name: pause
unpause
